attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mr Tony Blair,
I Am totally  against the suggestion that David Beckham should be honour in this way.
 There are a lot more peipole who do more without  the help of publicists,
I have always supported you and if you agree to the demands, I am sorry you will lose the support of a lot of people.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
